DOC.brief_summary: To provide maintenance treatment itraconazole solution patient clinical responder ITR-USA-94 protocol , even subsequently relapse .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Treatments Fungal Infections Mouth Throat HIV-Infected Patients Who Have Had Success With Itraconazole But Not With Fluconazole
DOC.detailed_description: Patients respond therapy protocol FDA 236B receive maintenance itraconazole oral solution 6 month .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Patients must : Met criterion clinical response protocol FDA 236B residual visible lesion oropharyngeal candidiasis upon completion study OR initial response protocol FDA 236B subsequent relapse retreatment itraconazole solution therapy . Life expectancy least 3 month . Exclusion Criteria Coexisting Condition : Patients follow symptoms condition exclude : Underlying clinical condition would preclude completion study place subject significant risk . Judged unreliable respect physician 's directive . Concurrent Medication : Excluded : Rifampin . Rifabutin . Phenobarbital . Phenytoin . Carbamazepine . Terfenadine . Astemizole . Systemic antifungal . Patients follow prior condition exclude : Previously document disseminated candidiasis . Previous clinically significant adverse event treatment itraconazole oral solution , unless clearly attributable intercurrent illness condition . History significant hepatic abnormality clinical evidence significant hepatic disease within 2 month prior study entry . Prior Medication : Excluded : Any investigational drug ( itraconazole solution ) within 1 month prior study entry .
